Blog.post: Boring day.. hahax.. today actually is meet gabriel and keong and kaihui they all go somerset da mechmaster play pool de.. keke.. den too tired.. den sleep... hahax.. sleep over shot.. hahax.. meet at 12 i sleep till 12+ abt 1 sia.. bths~ hahax.. den i wake up den i faster go bath and go find dem lor.. hahax.. reach abt 3.. duh~ it is late.. den today so cb.. when i wake up.. wan use com for a while.. den my cb father come kp say wad call me go bed.. say wan to clean the floor.. duh~ i say wait, den he show me fucking attitude.. makes me damn dulan. den after i reach dere.. den play play play lor.. hahax.. play finish den i go cine leisure makan.. haha.. we eat yoshinoya.. think is liketat spell ba.. hahax.. coz i dono how to spel.. hahax.. den after tt i go down to deyi secondary school.. haha this is my school.. keke.. b4 going dere.. i go 424 slack and smoke.. so song.. den cb gabriel.. make spoil my chain.. kns.. but nvm.. he giving me back the money.. yea~! hahax.. den go in den see the performance perform by our sch da ppl.. so farnie.. hahax.. den i sit at a nice place marhx.. coz i come earli.. we with keong dey all sit nice place.. den when the 20minutes interval break, we go outside gate smoke again.. wahaha.. is so song seh.. keke.. den when we go back.. ccb! a group of [in to kia] take up our space.. den i sibei dulan with him.. from in front sit watch wan den in the end go sit behind sit.. wtf~~~ behind see wad lanjiao sia.. pui! budden not bad.. behind i see mi fren.. hahax..a lot mi fren all sit behind.. think dey toot liaox.. hahax.. den we talk cock a lot.. den i tell dem abt the cb [in to kia] den dey say later after tt go ki with him.. haha.. den actualli wan beat wan.. but.. who knows.. so suay.. my PO(Probation Officer) called me.. damn.. make me run home seh.. den talk with my PO a while.. phew.. lucky she nv call me.. den i rush down back to the taiji dere after picking up a call from keong say he catch tt [in to kia] liaox.. wah.. den i run sia.. whole body sweat.. duh~ smelly.. hahax.. den me a lot fwen help me pui.. den actualli wan 1 to 1 de.. budden see mi da fwen and his stead quarrel bcoz of this problem.. den.. aiya.. forget abt it liaox.. den i run home again.. wahahaha.. den reach home use computer a while.. den my VPO (Volunteer Probation Officer OR Vice-Probation Officer)come check on me.. duh~ i also dono which name is the right wan.. haha.. sibei heng.. actualli today i wan breach de.. heng seh.. hahax.. den use com till now.. 2:23AM~~ alamak~!! still not tired.. so boring sia.. abt to die of boredom liaox.. kns.. but heng i now blasting techno~!! wee u wee~~ boring day~ k larhx.. finis liaox.. going for loko break again.. hahax.. bye~!! Signing Out: Salt~â„¢
